article.title: Elkins to Construct BAMS and P-8A Training Facility
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Elkins Constructors Incorporated, Jacksonville, Florida, is being awarded a $15,057,000 firm-fixed-price contract for construction of a new training facility at Naval Air Station Jacksonville. The proposed new construction will consist of a new Broad Area Maritime Surveillance unmanned aircraft system operator training facility and a new P-8A maintenance training facility. The Naval Facilities Engineering Command, Southeast, Jacksonville, Florida, is the contracting activity.
